short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetches the latest job listings from happyremote.work

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing the ultimate job search companion - our Google Chrome extension! With this lightweight and easy-to-use tool, you can access hundreds of remote jobs with just a few clicks. Whether you're searching for full-time or part-time opportunities, our extension provides you with a wide range of options to choose from.

One of the key features of our extension is the ability to set your favorite job categories. This means you can easily filter the available jobs based on your preferred industry or skillset. You no longer need to spend hours scrolling through job boards or sifting through irrelevant listings - our extension does the hard work for you.
